name: RPC Processing
JSON-RPC validation
MethodNotFound Error
func:
msg._error = [`Method ${msg.payload.method} not found`];
node.error("Method not found", msg);

rules.to: {  	   "jsonrpc": "2.0",	   "error": {  	      "code": rpcErrorCode ? rpcErrorCode: -32000,	      "message": error.message,	      "data": _error ? _error: error.source	   },	   "id": rpcId ? rpcId: payload.id	}

name: params
Methods
template:
getRandomAnimal:
  request:
    title: getRandomAnimal
    type: object
      
add:
  request:
    title: add
    type: object
    properties:
      number1:
        type: number
        minimum: 0
      number2:
        type: number
        minimum: 0
    required:
      - number1
      - number2
      
trigger: &trigger
  request:
    title: trigger
    type: object
    oneOf:
      - properties:
          list:
            type: array
            minItems: 1
            items:
              type: string
              pattern: 0222[A-F0-9]{32}AA01
          mode:
            type: string
            enum:
              - GO
        required:
          - mode
          - list
      # For punch, allow empty array
      - properties:
          list:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              pattern: 0222[A-F0-9]{32}AA01
          mode:
            type: string
            enum:
              - GOU
        required:
          - mode
          - list
